mapper.select: SELECT tp.title, SUM(r.total_price) AS total_sale FROM travel_products tp JOIN reservations r ON tp.product_id = r.product_id GROUP BY tp.title

SELECT tp.title, TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'MM') AS month, SUM(r.total_price) AS total_sales FROM travel_products tp JOIN reservations r ON tp.product_id = r.product_id GROUP BY tp.title, TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'MM') ORDER BY tp.title, month

SELECT tp.title AS title, TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'MM') AS month, SUM(r.total_price) AS total_sales FROM travel_products tp JOIN reservations r ON tp.product_id = r.product_id WHERE TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'YYYY') = #{year} AND TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'MM') = #{month} GROUP BY tp.title, TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'MM')
